column4: Is it only me, or does everybody think Opera is better than Firefox? Seriously, I want to know this before I go off churning from Firefox.
Lemme rephrase my question: I'm having graphical issues and larger load times with Firefox, what browser does someone recommend that's gecko-based?

firefox has more plugins, opera is in almost every other aspect better (except of course open source) and has most important stuff included (almost no need for plugins. i am using opera-irc right now for an example ;) )
